message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $20,000. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair starting point.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $15,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  While $15,000 is a bit lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we settle on $17,500?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget, I am comfortable to consider $16,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. $16,000 is getting closer, but I need to get a bit more for it to make sense on my end.  Would you be willing to do $16,750?
I understand your position, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I believe $16,500 would be a fair price for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable.
